Stewardship of our natural resources and minimizing our negative 
impact on the world around us is critical. This is complemented by 
an increased focus on our social impact both at the company level 
and throughout our supply chain. Additionally, we continue our 
strong governance principles to ensure our business practices are 
ethical, legal, and address the needs of all of our stakeholders. As a company, we made some great progress in 2022, but this is 
only the beginning. With clearly defined goals, and strategic focus 
from our staff, management, and board of directors we anticipate 
even greater success moving forward. Our integration efforts 
will only strengthen our ESG and sustainability programs. We are 
already working toward the implementation of the ISO 50001 
energy management system. Additionally, Net-Zero targets are 
in place and will be submitted jointly to the SBTi in 2023. We look 
forward to updating you on our progress in our 2023 report.
